attributes.action: Allow driving lessons and tests to continue as normal
attributes.additional_details:
There’s already delays for theory tests and practical tests. Causing another lockdown and not allowing these to continue will create even more delays.
Enforce masks and hand sanitiser before every lesson so there’s less chance of transmitting covid, especially with the fact there’s minimal contact in a car.
attributes.background: We want driving lessons and tests to continue. People have spent their money on lessons and tests already which is unfair for them as they’re getting cancelled.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462
